title: CIVITAS Activity Fund boost urban transport (UITP - International Union of Public Transport)
text: ( Source : UITP - International Union of Public Transport ) The CIVITAS Initiative , which works to promote and support cleaner and better transport in cities, launched the fourth and final call to its Activity Fund on 1 October. The Activity
